name: Lost Without Translation
description:
You're lost in a foreign airport, you must get your flight in time, using your phone indications

This game was made for the scribble jam and the challenge was "All text in your game must be a made up language".

Due to the challenge, it might be hard to get the controls so :

space to start/pause

backspace to turn on/off the music

arrow keys to chose your direction

This is my very first game made from scratch and finished, even if it's pretty simple and perfectible, I'm happy ~
